20550.「修行にかこつけて また 何か\n <pc>に ロクでもないことを\n させよう:
You're not trying to get <pc> here
to do something stupid for you again
pretending it's really training, are you?

20551.「……チッ！\n うるせーのが 来やがった。:
Tch! So the loudmouth shows himself yet
again!

20552.「<pc>。この間みたいに\n 借金のカタに 売られそうになったりしたら\n オ:
If you find yourself about to be sold off to
settle some debt like before, you come
and talk to me instead.

20553.「ちげえって！ 今回は なんと\n <pc>のファンからの ご指名で\n 仕事の:
No way! This time it was actually one of <if_woman>her<else>his<endif>
fans that asked me to do this for them!

20554.「……ふむ。名前も名乗らずに 呼びだして\n 仕事の内容も 現地で説明か……\n:
Riiight... Not even giving a name nor
explaining what the job actually is...
Sounds sketchy if you ask me.

20555.「まあ むこうにも都合が あるのかもな？\n それより ご指名で 仕事を依頼して:
Well, I suppose they have their reasons,
right? Quite the accomplishment to have fans
who want your help!

20556.「とりあえず 依頼人に会ってみて\n あんまり 怪しい依頼なら 断ればいいさ。\:
Anyways, you should go meet with them and
just refuse it if it seems too suspicious. You
can judge that for yourself.

20557.「……ぐぬぬっ。おのれ セインズ。\n これじゃ 誰が <pc>の師匠か\n わ:
Rgghh... That damn Sainz...
I'm <pc>'s master, NOT you!

20558.「おお これは <pc>選手。\n このような遠方まで よく来てくださいました。:
Oh, this is a member of the team,
<pc>. Thank you for coming such a
long way.

20559.「私は ワケあって名前は 明らかにできない\n さる人物の 代理人を務める者です:
I am an Agent for a certain person whose name, for some reason, I cannot reveal. Yes. I'm talking about someone who claims to be a Fan
Fan of yours.

20560.「では さっそく 仕事の話に入りましょう。\n 今回の依頼は 難しいものではない:
Let's get down to business right away. This
request is not difficult, but it is something
only a battle master can do...

20561.「そこで 我が主の意向により\n あなたに 白羽の矢が立ったというわけです。: Therefore, my Lord has chosen you.

20562.「この洞くつに出現する <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n とうこん討ちを使:
The Direlog that appears in this cave drops a
unique flower called the "Moonlight Flower"
only when you use Clap Trap to finish it off.

20563.「この花には 赤 白 青の３色がありまして。\n あなたへの依頼というのは この:
These flowers come in three colors: red,
white, and blue. Your request is to collect
all three colors of flowers.

20564.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>という\n バトルマスター専用の\:
The reward is a special headband for
Battlemasters called a Battlemaster Headband.

20565.「おお ありがとうございます！\n さすがは 我が主の見込んだ方ですな。:
Oh, thank you! You are indeed the one whom my
Lord has chosen.

20566.「それでは 私は いったん \n 失礼させていただきます。\n いろいろと 忙し:
Now, if you will excuse me for a moment, I
have a lot of work to do. I am busy with
various things.

20567.「月光の花が ３色 集まった頃に\n また ここへ来ますので あなたも\n こち:
I will be back here again when the three
colors of moonlight flowers have gathered, so
please come back to us.

20568.「それでは また後ほど。\n くれぐれも よろしくお願いしますよ。:
I will see you later. Thank you very much for
your cooperation.

20569.「おお ありがとうございます！\n ……と言いたいところですが どうやら\n 他:
Oh, thank you! I'd like to say thank you, but
apparently I have a lot of other requests.

20570.「さすがは 我が主の見込んだ方。\n 引く手あまたということですな。:
As one would expect from our Lord. I can't
wait to see what you can come up with.

20571.「さあ はやく 他の頼みごとを片付けてきて\n また ここまで 来てくださいね。:
Now, hurry up and go take care of your other
business and come back here again.

20572.「なんと！ それは 困りましたな。\n 私も 主の手前 断られたからといって\n:
What a surprise! That's a problem, isn't it? I
can't just retreat just because my Lord
refuses my offer, but...

20573.「しかし ここで にらみあってても仕方ない。\n もし 考えが変わったら また:
But there's no use in standing around here and having a standoff. If you change your mind, please come again. I'll be waiting for you,
believing that.

20574.「おお。来てくださったということは\n 今度こそ 我が主からの依頼を\n 引き受:
Oh. Now that you have come, you are going to
accept my Lord's request this time, aren't
you?

20575.「この洞くつに出現する <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n とうこん討ちを使:
The Direlog that appears in this cave drops a
unique flower called the "Moonlight Flower"
only when you use Clap Trap to finish it off.

20576.「この花には 赤 白 青の３色がありまして。\n あなたへの依頼というのは この:
These flowers come in three colors: red,
white, and blue. Your request is to collect
all three colors of flowers.

20577.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>という\n バトルマスター専用の\:
The reward is a special headband for
Battlemasters called a Battlemaster Headband.

20578.「どうやら ３色の 月光の花を\n 集めてきていただけたようですね。\n さあ:
It appears that you have collected the three
colors of moonlight flowers. Now, please hand
them over here.

20579.<pc>は 代理人に\n３色の 月光の花を 渡した！:
<pc> handed the Agent a tri-colored
moonflower!

20580.「……確かに 受け取りました。\n これで 貴重な花束が 作れますよ。\n フフ:
I have indeed received them. Now you can make
your precious bouquet. Hmph...

20581.「それでは こちらが 約束の報酬です。\n どうぞ お受け取り下さい。:
Now, here is the promised reward. Please
accept it.

20582.「では 私は これで\n 失礼させていただきます。\n なにせ 忙しい身でしてね:
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go. I am
very busy.

20586.「どうも こいつら 正気じゃねーみてえだ。\n 今は 下手に刺激しないほうが い:
Thanks. These guys look like they're out of
their minds. We shouldn't provoke them now!

20587.「……なるほど。アンタから臭ってくる\n 独特の香りが デンタザウルスを\n コ:
I see. It seems that the distinctive aroma
coming from you is making Tortoceratops
excited.

20588.「とりあえず 緊急措置だ！\n 悪く思うなよ。:
For now, it's an emergency measure! No hard
feelings.

20589.仮面バスターは <pc>に\nどくどくヘドロを 振りかけた！:
The Mask Buster sprinkled <pc> with
Manky Mud!

20590.辺りに きつい臭いが広がって\nデンタザウルスたちは\nクモの子を散らすように:
A strong smell spread through the area and the
Tortoceratops fled like spiders scattering
their young!

20591.「……ほう 月光の花集めね。\n そんな仕事を 頼まれてたのか。:
Oh, collecting moonlight flowers. You were
asked to do such a job?

20592.「そういえば 聞いたことがあるぜ。\n ３色の 月光の花の香りが 混じると\n:
Come to think of it, I've heard that when the
scents of three different colored moonlight
flowers mingle, they attract Tortoceratops.

20593.「おまけに デンタザウルスってのは\n 本来 この辺りには いない魔物だ。\n:
In addition, Tortoceratops is a monster that
doesn't belong around here. I don't know where
it came from...

20594.「どうやら アンタ 何か面倒ごとに\n 巻き込まれたみたいだな。\n こりゃ 陰:
Looks like you're in some kind of trouble. I
smell a conspiracy.

20595.「だが まずは どくどくヘドロの臭いを\n どうにかすべきだな。ここにいると \:
But first, we should do something about the
smell of Manky Mud. I'm going to leave now, my
nose is getting a bit runny from being here.

47403.「……どうでしょう？\n ３色の月光の花 集めてもらえますか？:
How about... could you collect the three
colors of moonlight flowers?

47404.「報酬には <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>を\n 用意しております。どうでし:
We have a Battlemaster Headband for the
reward. What do you think, could you collect
the 3 colors of moonlight flowers?

47405.「……どうでしょう？\n ３色の月光の花 集めてもらえますか？:
How about... could you collect the three
colors of moonlight flowers?
